title: 連登仔定五毛? 取笑英國首相的人, 一係五毛, 一係識條鐵, 一係藍屍之流

replies.msg:
BOJO政府的APPROVAL RATING係過去10年最高的政府
英國國民都OK, 你班香港人只係識笑人佛系同唔戴罩,
好心咪撚咁天線得得B

https://www.express.co.uk/news/politics/1264105/boris-johnson-approval-rating-tory-government-popularity-yougov-coronavirus
Boris Johnson enjoys highest rating as 1st time in a decade UK approves of its government
BORIS JOHNSON'S government has soared in ratings among British voters amid the coronavirus crisis, becoming the most popular government in 10 years.

好多香港人視野真係好撚窄
講嚟講去都係三幅被
只係介乎於陳百祥阿叻水平的懶叻
